snippet: South Korean officials cited an intelligence assessment confirming an American report that North Korea had restarted a reactor in its Yongbyon complex.
abstract: South Korea’s main intelligence agency confirms that North Korea has restarted Soviet-era nuclear reactor that has been used to obtain plutonium for bombs.
lead_paragraph: South Korean officials cited an intelligence assessment confirming an American report that North Korea had restarted a reactor in its Yongbyon complex.

headline.main: South Korea Says North Restarted Nuclear Reactor
headline.print_headline:
North Korea Has Restarted Reactor,
South Korean Officials Say
